Nov 3 (Reuters) -

  • ABRDN SAYS IT SETS TARGET TO REDUCE THE CARBON INTENSITY OF ASSETS IT MANAGES BY 50% BY 2030

  • ABRDN SAYS WILL DIVEST FROM COMPANIES WHERE, AFTER TWO YEARS, IT CONSIDERS INSUFFICIENT PROGRESS HAS BEEN MADE AGAINST THE TRANSITION MILESTONES SET, UNLESS IT’S NOT IN LINE WITH THE CLIENT MANDATE

  • ABRDN TARGETS NET ZERO IN ITS OPERATIONS BY 2040



(Reporting By Carolyn Cohn)
